name: Cokeman5's Party Game
description:
This was my first game jam, and the game didn't out quite how I hoped it would. I got pretty lazy and overambitious. In the end there is no audio, main menu, networking, or in-game instructions. The art is bad, and  the branching pathways can get a bit glitchy.

Blue spaces: +1 point

Red spaces: -1 point

Lime spaces: Item space

Get to 10 points and you win!
